>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<



>>===== RESULT =====>>
>>[0] [3]â€“[5]
<<===== RESULT =====<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1", 
                    "locator": "para. 3-5"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <locale>
    <terms>
      <term name="paragraph" form="static">[%s]</term>
    </terms>
  </locale>
  <macro name="xjuris-locator-label">
    <!-- The label applied to pinpoint locators -->
    <choose>
      <if locator="paragraph">
        <label variable="locator" form="static"/>
      </if>
      <else>
        <label variable="locator" form="symbol"/>
      </else>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="xjuris-default-spotter">
    <group delimiter=" " reject="label-empty-or-alpha">
      <text macro="xjuris-locator-label"/>
      <number variable="locator"/>
    </group>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <text macro="xjuris-default-spotter"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1",
        "title": "Title", 
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
